Body: Well, I should start with sample stuff then I increase the complexity progressively. As you said, the availability of a device is an important thing and should be taken into consideration (depending on the type of this device) but it stills much more. I start exploring the NetworkX" library and I need someone who had experience with just to know how much it can be useful in this work ? and How ?"
seems like a pretty open ended question; not sure how suitable it is for stack overflow.  that said; how about network topology and device availability
